caption: The video begins with a startling scene of a man standing bloodied and disoriented on the street, attracting the shocked stares of passersby. In his moment of utmost vulnerability, his girlfriend finally locates him. Dropping everything she has with her, she rushes to him and embraces him tightly, offering him comfort and support. The man is subsequently admitted to the hospital where he receives medical treatment. Inside the hospital, he experiences a semblance of peace, recovering from the physical and possibly emotional wounds that have befallen him. Outside, his girlfriend waits, showing her dedication and love, anticipating the day he will be discharged and they can resume their lives together.

global.question: When does the things in the video happens, acient, modern, or in the future?
Are there more than three different places appear in the video(scene switch doesn't necessarily means a place change)?
Is there more than three different characters appear?
what time does the video take place?(at day time or night time?)
global.answer: Both at day time and at night time.

global.question: Where does the video take place? Indoors or outdoors?
